ygData.subject: Re: Questionable?
ygData.msgSnippet: AzureBlade: Yes, I do understand that you can have doubts about me and that you would wish to test me out first. But let me first tell you about my sins. As I

AzureBlade:
Yes, I do understand that you can have doubts about me and that you would 
wish to test me out first. But let me first tell you about my sins. As I see 
the look on your face, you must have heard of me, or at least of my 
so-called brother, X. As you know, he was captured after the destruction of 
colony Omicron. In fact, I was part of the team that went to get him, but he 
had us ambushed by some predacons. I went berserk and slaughtered them all, 
but when my superior saw that I wouldn't stop, he ordered me to, and I 
engaged him in combat. He is one of my victim now, and that is one thing I 
shall never wish to forget, elseway I might repeat this again...


>From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Questionable?
>Date: Mon, 09 Jul 2001 19:43:13 -0700
>
>* Iron Raptor nodded at HotRods report, rather impressed.*
>
>" Thank you, Hot Rod.   And as a reward for your loyalty, I would ask that
>you please assemble a unit of 12 outside the city limits. Ready to move out
>and assist the Chevron cause at my command."
>
>* Thus...she placed her faith in the Maximal that stood at her side. As
>squad leader for this mission.
>It HAD occurred to her time and time again that, someday and soon, she had
>to single out and officially title a transformer to take up the role of
>2nd-In-Command.
>But her attention was soon grasped by AzureBlade; a pleased look crossing
>her features when he bowed but then that expression was wiped clean off her
>face when he suddenly spoke his TRUE name.
>< Protoform Z?!>
>She remembered the reports on the Protoform X that was in the original 
>Beast
>Wars...and she remembered the fight she had with it before she was named
>3rd-in-command.
>Slag! That had been one tough bot.
>And here, bot bowing right in front of her was just ANOTHER of those
>creatures.
>Iron Raptor's expression became cold as she eyed AzureBlade, a thoughtful
>brow lifting. The dominant claw on her boot armor coming down and sparks
>flew as the tip collided with the armored floor.
>It was questionable...yes. But could she condemn another prototype that was
>no different then herself?
>Her expression softened a bit.*
>
>" AzureBlade...though I know nothing of your sins I am sure that, as long 
>as
>your actions remain true to the Maximal cause, orders are followed, and 
>your
>loyalty remains pure for the remainder of your existence, all will be
>forgiven."
>
>* A growl tricked from her throat as blue eyes narrowed.*
>
>" But for a time being you will remain close to me. So that you not only
>show that you are worthy to the fellow Maximals but to me as well.
>Until you have proven so, your acceptance into this unit is reserved."
>
>* Iron Raptor looked down at him.*
>
>" Do you understand?"
>
>
>
>
>
>
